name: cfdump
description:
Outputs the elements, variables and values of most kinds of
 CFML objects. Useful for debugging. You can display the
 contents of simple and complex variables, objects, components,
 user-defined functions, and other elements.

params.name: var
params.description:
Variable to display. Enclose a variable name in pound
 signs.

params.name: expand
params.description: Yes: In Internet Explorer and Mozilla, expands views

params.name: format
params.description: specify whether to save the results of a cfdump to a file in text or HTML format

params.name: keys
params.description: For a structure, number of keys to display.

params.name: label
params.description: A string; header for the dump output.

params.name: metainfo
params.description: Includes information about the query in the cfdump results.

params.name: output
params.description: Where to send the results of cfdump.

params.name: top
params.description: The number of rows to display. For a structure, this is the number of nested levels to display (useful for large stuctures).
